<em>Provide other users access to {[machine.name]} machine by adding their Mothership1 user name and specify access right.</em>
<form ng-submit="addUser()"  ng-controller="MachineShareController">
<div class="table-responsive margin-top-medium">
    <table class="table users-table">
        <tr class="header">
            <th class="username-text-container width-60">
                <input type="text" ng-change="userError=Null" placeholder="Username or email address" class="username-text" ng-model="newUser.nameOrEmail" required="required">
            </th>
            <th class="txt-center">
                <select class="access-rights" ng-model="newUser.access" required>
                	<option ng-repeat="type in accessTypes" value="{[type.value]}">{[type.name]}</option>
                </select>
            </th>
            <th class="txt-center"><input type="submit" class="btn" style="padding: 2px 10px;" value="Add"></input></th>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td colspan=2 ng-cloak ng-show="userError">
                <div class="alert alert-error margin-bottom-none">
                    {[ userError ]}
                </div>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr ng-cloak ng-repeat="user in machine.acl">
            <td>{[user.userGroupId]}</td>
		    <td class="txt-center">
		    	<span ng-switch on="user.right">
		    		<span class="access-right alert alert-success" ng-switch-when="R" style="padding: 3px 23px; border: solid 1px rgb(206, 239, 156);"> Read </span>
		    		<span class="access-right alert alert-warning" ng-switch-when="RCX" style="padding: 3px 7px;"> Read/Write </span>
		    		<span class="access-right alert alert-danger" ng-switch-default style="padding: 3px 20px;"> Admin </span>
		    	</span>

		    </td>
            <td class="txt-center"><a ng-click="" class="fa fa-edit margin-right-small txt-17"></a><a ng-click="deleteUser(machine.id, user.userGroupId)" class="fa fa-times txt-17"></a></td>
        </tr>
    </table>
</div>
</form>
